content: easy crochet pattern of granny hood this stylish hood is made of two classic granny squares easily customizable in terms of colorway and size you can make one for yourself and each one of your friends just using up your yarn stash a quick and rewarding project to enlighten the grey and windy season in style great stash busting project you can use almost any yarn you have and even very small amounts of them finished size 30x39cm/12x15 5 width x length to fit most adult heads with instructions on how to easily customize size for any head circumference skills needed us terms single_crochet single_crochet in back loop only double_crochet crocheting in rounds crocheting in row pattern is written in us terms in english only
